channel.title: Posts on FA Soccer
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on FA Soccer

item.title: Tools for Soccer Analytics
item.description: The aim of this blogpost is to document all the tools and resources that are necessary to start soccer analytics. I will point out here that Mr. Maias Mascioto’s github page has a more comprehensive collection of very very useful resources for data analytics. My intention is to add resource items as I learn and use them in my analysis. I am starting to explore the soccer analytics following the “Friends of Tracking” youtube channel.
